0.1.name: wordpress/traffic-link
0.1.description: Traffic Link is a great tool to promote your blog to other similar blogs. Our unique algorithm automatically finds similar blogs with yours and it shows your link on them enabling you to reach users that are interested in your niche. <br/> The widget is very easy to use, just install the plugin and put the widget in your sidebar, from there on it will show relevant links and your site will also appear on other sites that use our plugin.
